tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE loss_history_data (
    incident_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_date DATE,
    customer_name VARCHAR(255),
    claim_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    settlement_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE LossHistory (
    incident_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_date DATE,
    incident_description TEXT,
    claim_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    settlement_date DATE,
    settlement_amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE UnderwritingRisk (
    risk_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    policy_holder_id INT,
    policy_start_date DATE,
    policy_end_date DATE,
    risk_rating INT,
    risk_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE LossHistoryData (
  incident_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  incident_date DATE NOT NULL,
  incident_description TEXT,
  claim_amount DECIMAL NOT NULL,
  settlement_date DATE,
  settlement_amount DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE IncidentDetails (
  incident_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  incident_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  location VARCHAR(100),
  damage_description TEXT,
  cause_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE LossHistoryData (
    incident_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_date DATE,
    incident_description TEXT,
    claim_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    settlement_details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE IncidentDetails (
    incident_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    policy_number VARCHAR(20),
    policy_holder_name VARCHAR(50),
    policy_type VARCHAR(20),
    incident_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE ClaimDetails (
    claim_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_id INT,
    claim_date DATE,
    claim_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    settlement_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE SettlementDetails (
    settlement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    claim_id INT,
    settlement_date DATE,
    settlement_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    settlement_notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE LossHistoryData (
  incident_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  incident_date DATE,
  incident_description TEXT,
  claim_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
  settlement_date DATE,
  settlement_amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE IncidentDetails (
  incident_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  cause VARCHAR(100),
  risk_level INT,
  claimant_name VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE ClaimantDetails (
  claimant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  claimant_name VARCHAR(255),
  claimant_address TEXT,
  claimant_phone VARCHAR(15),
  claimant_email VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE UnderwritingData (
  underwriting_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  policy_number VARCHAR(20),
  premium_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
  coverage_limit DECIMAL(10, 2),
  risk_score INT
);

CREATE TABLE RiskAssessment (
  risk_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  incident_id INT,
  underwriting_id INT,
  assessment_date DATE,
  assessment_notes TEXT
);
